entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
